mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.family_id as familyId, c.device_sn as deviceSn, c.product_code as productCode, c.havc_fault_flag as havcFaultFlag, c.value_fault_flag as valueFaultFlag, c.online_flag as onlineFlag, c.device_id as deviceId from family_device_info_status c where c.family_id =#{familyId} and c.device_id = #{deviceId};
